definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Now after a paragraph of design loaded compressed roll-off garbage trucks will effectively solve these problems.
sentences.chinese: 現設計一款後裝壓縮式垃圾車將有效的解決這些問題。

sentences.english: Back-loaded compaction garbage handlers and the developing trend of garbage handlers in our country.
sentences.chinese: 後裝壓縮式垃圾車是我國垃圾車發展的主要方向。

sentences.english: Back-loaded compaction garbage handlers and the developing trend of garbage handlers in our country.
sentences.chinese: 後裝壓縮式垃圾車是我國垃圾車發展的主要方向。

sentences.english: At the end of the event, a garbage truck took away the shredded papers for recycling.
sentences.chinese: 活動快結束時，碎紙片被一輛垃圾車運往回收站。

sentences.english: In Egypt, waste is collected by rubbish cars and sorted.
sentences.chinese: 在埃及，用垃圾車收集廢物，再加以分類。

sentences.english: The heavily-loaded garbage truck lumbered down the street.
sentences.chinese: 滿載重物的垃圾車笨重地駛過街道。

sentences.english: We need to sort the garbage out before the truck comes.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要在垃圾車來前就做好垃圾分類。

sentences.english: So this was it: The "Law of the Garbage Truck.
In Egypt, waste is collected by rubbish carts and sorted.
sentences.chinese: 在埃及，廢品被垃圾車收集起來並被分類。

sentences.english: Since then, I have started to see Garbage Trucks everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 從那時起，我到處都看得見垃圾車。

definition: to disappear without trace/to vanish all of a sudden/to spread fast/to spread like wildfire
to repair in a rush/rush repairs
